DOC.brief_summary: The investigator wish compare efficacy patient tolerability preparation consist 2L Golytely ( PEG + electrolytes ) plus 15mg bisacodyl v standard preparation 4L Golytely . The investigator hypothesize 2L Golytely 15mg bisacodyl show similar bowel cleanse efficacy offering well tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing 4L Golytely 2L Golytely With 15mg Bisacodyl Regimens Inpatient Colonic Preparation
DOC.criteria: Inpatients undergo colonoscopy Age 19 Unable provide inform consent Patients constipation Patients suspect bowel obstruction severe inflammatory bowel disease Sameday colonoscopy Intensive/critical care patient History colorectal resection
